channel.title: Chat Packet Modification [Server/Client Sided]
channel.description:
Alright, I know that there are different chat packets used, such as packet 4 for normal chat, 60 for clan chat, and I'm sure there's one for sendMessage but I don't know it (Game Chat). What I want to do is add, or modify the one used for assists. I know it's there somewhere, but I don't know where. :P
The following is what needs to be accomplished: Find out the packet for Assist chat. Find out how to correctly send data to said packet Find out how to add it in the Assist chat mode.
So basically, I'm trying to figure out how to add assists messaging system.

item.title: Chat Packet Modification [Server/Client Sided]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Fire capez:

sorry - the original 317 client doesn’t have that; if the packet has been added it will most likely be under privacy options under packet 95.

Trade and duel aren’t under 95, they use the same packet as chat.
Honestly I think clan chat and private chat are the only ones that use a different packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Chat Packet Modification [Server/Client Sided]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:6, topic:526324”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645067.msg4339878#msg4339878 date=1375015612]

erm - I have little experience with newer engine clients and I don’t even know what the assist packet does but search for similar packets and strings that relate to it in the client and deduce which one is correct.

Newer? Bro I’m using 317.
You literally gave me no help besides a bump.
[/quote]

sorry - but what is assist chat then? I thought you were talking about the assist system in newer clients. (afaik there isn’t an assist packet???)[/quote]
This:

Edit:

There is a reason I said chat packet modification…

Read full topic
